thread.title: Tom Brady told Isaiah Thomas 'it's your turn next' after Super Bowl win | NBA | Sporting News
thread.title_full: Tom Brady told Isaiah Thomas 'it's your turn next' after Super Bowl win | NBA | Sporting News

author: Kirstie Chiappelli Omnisport
title: Tom Brady told Isaiah Thomas 'it's your turn next' after Super Bowl win | NBA | Sporting News
text:
— Boston Celtics (@celtics) February 8, 2017 
"He said it’s not over ’til it’s over," Thomas said Tuesday, via the Boston Globe . "He was just proud of his teammates. That’s what he texted back, that he was proud of his team and the city. Nobody gave up and they just kept fighting. And he was like, ‘It’s your turn next.’ So now he’s putting the pressure on us, but hopefully we can make something happen." 
Thomas, who received Brady's autographed No. 12 jersey worn against the Houston Texans in the divisional playoff round, has always showed his support for the franchise quarterback and credits the "the greatest football player that’s ever been" as an inspiration. Tom Brady best ever!!!! — Isaiah Thomas (@Isaiah_Thomas) February 6, 2017 A photo posted by Isaiah Thomas (@isaiahthomas) on Jul 2, 2016 at 6:39pm PDT 
Talk about a blossoming Boston bromance. Watch This
